title: Kiss Me Petruchio (Captioned)
brief_description: This is a funny, fast-paced documentary based on the New York Shakespeare Festival’s production of “The Taming of the Shrew”. starring Meryl Streep and Raul Julia. This film goes behind the scenes to find out what makes the 400-year-old play relevant to audiences today. The show features interviews intercut with sections of the play.
